Articles.Content:
So now that I've landed on Duna and Dres, it's Gilly time!

The Dres Explorer was re-christened the Gilly Explorer, a newly-designed lander and fuel tank were docked on, and off to Eve we went. Everything went smoothly, and the crew is now waiting for the window home.

I had a Duna window open during the wait, so I sent a kethane-capable roving habitat to Ike to set up an initial base for exploration and exploitation.

Here's the album:
